Package org.jivesoftware.smackx.attention.packet

Stanzas and extension elements for XEP-224: Attention.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttentionExtension
    A PacketExtension that implements XEP-0224: Attention This extension is expected to be added to message stanzas of type 'headline.' Please refer to the XEP for more implementation guidelines.
    AttentionExtension.Provider
    A ExtensionElementProvider for the AttentionExtension.

Package org.jivesoftware.smackx.attention.packet Description
